name: Hentai Sakura Puzzle
description:
"Hentai Sakura Puzzle" is a sliding puzzle that consists of a frame of square tiles in random order with one tile missing. The object of the puzzle is to place the tiles in order by making sliding moves that use the empty space.
Put pieces together in a logical way in order to arrive at the correct solution of the puzzle."Hentai Sakura Puzzle" is a logical game featuring:
  • nice artwork
  • relaxing background music
  • 27 Levels
  • 100 Steam achievements
